title.rendered: Preparing Albanian SMEs for the EU Single Market

content.rendered:
From October 2024 to January 2025, Prishtina REA, in collaboration with EBRD-ASB, the Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Business Climate, the National Economic Council, and the Albanian Manufacturers Union, successfully implemented a series of workshops aimed at empowering Albanian SMEs to access the EU Single Market Programme.
 
With four series of workshops tailored to SMEs’ needs, the program provided training on EU funding applications, compliance, sustainability, and digital transformation. The sessions focused on:
 
General Overview: EU regulatory frameworks and funding opportunities
Sector-Specific Training: Manufacturing, Agriculture, and Tourism Through practical exercises, expert-led sessions, and networking opportunities, over 120 participants gained actionable knowledge to elevate their businesses on the EU stage.
 
These workshops are a testament to the importance of capacity-building initiatives for SME growth, innovation, and competitiveness.
 
Let’s continue driving progress together and unlocking opportunities in the European market!
